Hi,

    I am a regular reader of Eric Allen's series at IBM devoloperWorks.
In his newest article
(http://www-106.ibm.com/developerworks/java/library/j-diag0612.html) he
intermingles test code with production code. In my opinion, this has a bad
smell, but ... well, I am interested of your opinion as I am not to sure if
I am right.

Toyin
subject: Does this have a bad smell
